https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/kEVyAkEkpwpfyx4oZMg22A8ivDI.jpg Tomaz, an ex-soldier now homeless in London, is offered a place to stay at a decaying house, inhabited by a young woman and her dying mother. As he starts to fall for Magda, Tomaz cannot ignore his suspicion that something insidious might also be living alongside them. Amulet
